column4: is there ANY posibility to have two network cards in my box, and make one share the internet and the other receive it? is that posible?

cause I have to do it..i have my server running perfectly...but i cant put it online for the outside world...i cant pass the router...no matter if i forward the ports.....cant do it.....it wont go....so Im thinking to put the box directly to the internet, and use the box as the router...what do you guys think? is that posible?
